titles.title: To amend section 3 of the United States Housing Act of 1937 to more accurately determine the median income for Rockland County, New York, for purposes of housing programs administered by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 with regard to certain median income determinations in Rockland County, New York.
